subject: World Series
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Phillies consider Carlos Ruiz’s hitting a bonus as long as he continues guiding their staff, which had the National League’s fourth-best earned run average, toward a World Series title.
snippet: The Phillies consider Carlos Ruiz’s hitting a bonus as long as he continues guiding their staff, which had the National League’s fourth-best earned run average, toward a World Series title.
